functions.name: get controller
functions.description: Retrieves the system information from an access controller.

functions.name: set IPv4
functions.description: Sets the controller IPv4 address, netmask and gateway address.

functions.name: get time
functions.description: Retrieves the access controller system date and time.

functions.name: set time
functions.description: Sets the access controller system date and time.

functions.name: get listener
functions.description: Retrieves the access controller event listener IPv4 address:port and auto-send interval.

functions.name: set listener
functions.description: Sets the access controller event listener IPv4 address:port and auto-send interval.

functions.name: get door control
functions.description: Retrieves the control mode and unlock delay time for an access controller door.

functions.name: set door control
functions.description: Sets the control mode and unlock delay time for an access controller door.

functions.name: open door
functions.description: Unlocks a door controlled by an access controller.

functions.name: get status
functions.description: Retrieves the system status from an access controller.

fields.name: relays
fields.description: bitset of door unlock relay states

fields.name: event direction
fields.description: last event door direction (0: in, 1: out)

functions.name: set door passcodes
functions.description: Sets up to 4 passcodes for a controller door.

fields.name: relays
fields.description: bitset of door unlock relay states

fields.name: event direction
fields.description: last event door direction (0: in, 1: out)
